segments.text: You are quite busy every day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Work starts at eight and I arrive home after six .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So you have to work all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can take a break at lunch time , but it is only 30 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see you sometimes work on weekends , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I really don't like it .
segments.speaker: S2
